Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory338.jpg'}
{3: 'The explosions and lightning finally quiet down, replaced by flames flickering on the field.'}
{3: 'Standing on top of a sea of scrapped parts, the Cerberus members look like they are the actual bandits of this land.'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, the real thug shakes like a child who is afraid to go to the bathroom at night, stepping back slowly and carrying a bag of explosives in his arms.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'How troublesome.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "So many defecting Constructs of unknown origins. Why don't we rename ourselves as Purifying Force Volunteers?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'These were all lackeys that could barely hold their own.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We can't work for free, no matter what! Not to mention that all these chores are delaying our mission.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera glares at Noctis angrily.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Look at the mess you've drawn to us.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Owner', 3: 'S-stay... stay there! This bomb can level a village!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Oh? How interesting.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Vera continues to walk toward the owner daringly.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "None of your men can fight for you anymore. You're on your own.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: "T-there's still someone above me!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: "Don't you think you can get away!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: "Someone's watching over me! His name will scare the shit out of your Inver-Device!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I can't wait to meet him.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Unless you're actually a useless coward who's too scared to blow all of us up along with yourself?", 4: '2'}
{3: "Desperation is like a rope, the owner's fearful trembling passing from one end to the other. The closer Vera gets, the more the rope tightens around his neck, strangling him on the gallows."}
{3: 'Executioners often wear masks, but not Vera.'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: "D-don't force meâ€”", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The sound of a gunshot dissipates so quickly on such an expansive field. Like a torn sack, the owner crumples to the ground.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "The bullet's coming from...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Beardy', 3: 'No point wasting your breath with him.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Beardy carefully wraps his gun in cloth before standing up with a limp.'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'I doubt you Constructs would get hurt if that bomb did go off.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'But the things I have with me would certainly get destroyed. So would these goons... Get lost already, you fools!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Beardy's hoarse and deep voice drives away the strange-looking goons, and they scramble to run away."}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'A group of riff-raff is what they are...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "You're... Babylonians, aren't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "I've seen the emblem you're wearing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You're also from Babylonia?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "No. I've just seen it a long time ago.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "What I'm trying to say is that this is the land of outlaws. No one's gonna recognize the authority of Babylonia here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Bad guys are bad... so good guys need to be worse.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Beardy waves his wrapped gun.'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'He was going to die anyway. You were never going to scare him into a good person. This was more effective.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hm... Great minds think alike!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Fewer words, more action! I like it!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'My foot! My foot! Hiss...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Noctis puts his arm around Beardy's shoulders as if they have reached some kind of accord."}
{1: '1', 3: "Vera chuckles. She grabs the old-school explosives from the garage owner's body and ties them onto her banner spear before turning away and leaving."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'No. 21. Bring the scraps.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Understood. Should I clean the battlefield?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'No. Just bring the pile of motorcycle parts.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Someone will take the rest when they pass by.', 4: '1'}
{3: "No. 21 nods, grabbing all the broken parts in one big swoop without hesitation and securing them onto the battered car's trunk."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Sure. It's just a bunch of junk anyway.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera opens the door and, hesitating briefly but plainly, places the bomb in the back seats.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Take the shotgun seat, No. 21.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Move, you two!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera shouts at the limping Beardy and the prattling Noctis in the back.'}
